data.name: Crossfar
data.detailed_description:
Master the art of zero gravity warfare in Crossfar! Fight as a pilot, lead as a captain, and conquer as a general in intense PVP battles to earn your wings.



Perform spectacular maneuvers while free-floating and flying, as you zero down your aim to land your next shot center mass and reshape the frontlines of the galaxy!



Prepare for tactical decision-making and explosive reactions at any moment! Work in a formation with your squad and utilize each drone's special abilities to gain supremacy over the battlefield.



Disarm, disable, distract or destroy enemy pilots to sneak past and breach their gate. Lure your enemies into a trap to counter their offensive or keep them at bay with sheer firepower! It's up to you and your team how you address every situation!



Grab your best squadron and join the competitive community in season tournaments, or watch the best professional teams battle it out in CROSSFAR LEAGUE!
data.about_the_game:
Master the art of zero gravity warfare in Crossfar! Fight as a pilot, lead as a captain, and conquer as a general in intense PVP battles to earn your wings.



Perform spectacular maneuvers while free-floating and flying, as you zero down your aim to land your next shot center mass and reshape the frontlines of the galaxy!



Prepare for tactical decision-making and explosive reactions at any moment! Work in a formation with your squad and utilize each drone's special abilities to gain supremacy over the battlefield.



Disarm, disable, distract or destroy enemy pilots to sneak past and breach their gate. Lure your enemies into a trap to counter their offensive or keep them at bay with sheer firepower! It's up to you and your team how you address every situation!



Grab your best squadron and join the competitive community in season tournaments, or watch the best professional teams battle it out in CROSSFAR LEAGUE!
data.short_description: Fight in fast-paced PVP space battles with hardcore team tactics in zero gravity! Choose from five drone classes upon respawns and put your spectacular pilot skills on display to defend your gate, destroy or sneak past the enemy defenses, cross the field and breach the enemy gate on the far side.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 8 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 AMD Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 200 Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9400F AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
